items.content_html: LLRT (Low Latency Runtime) is an experimental, lightweight JavaScript runtime designed to address the growing demand for fast and efficient Serverless applications.

items.content_html: A lightweight utility to convert strings into URL-friendly slugs, with support for removing Vietnamese diacritics and handling special characters.
items.title: vnodesign/slugify: A lightweight utility to convert strings into URL-friendly slugs, with support for removing Vietnamese diacritics and handling special characters.

items.content_html: A lightweight, zero-dependencies open-source password validator according to NIST guidelines.
items.title: ypreiser/NIST-password-ts: A lightweight, zero-dependencies open-source password validator according to NIST guidelines.

items.content_html: This repository provides a lightweight, REST API powered by JSON Server, designed to handle dynamic CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on a simple JSON-based database. It allows developers to quickly spin up a full API for testing, prototyping, and front-end development without the need for a real database or backend infrastructure
items.title: adham025/Dynamic-JSON-Server-CRUD: This repository provides a lightweight, REST API powered by JSON Server, designed to handle dynamic CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on a simple JSON-based database. It allows developers to quickly spin up a full API for testing, prototyping, and front-end development without the need for a real database or backend infrastructure

items.content_html: A fast, lightweight, browser-based note-taking app that persists notes locally using localStorage.
items.title: felipe-parodi/quickjot: A fast, lightweight, browser-based note-taking app that persists notes locally using localStorage.

items.content_html: Lightweight and type-safe query builder for DynamoDB and TypeScript
items.title: dynamodb-toolbox/dynamodb-toolbox: Lightweight and type-safe query builder for DynamoDB and TypeScript

items.content_html: A simple link aggregation tool built with React, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Inspired by Linktree, it helps organize and share links on a single, customizable page. Lightweight, responsive, and perfect for personal use.Input component can be used by anyone just by modifying the parameters.
items.title: himanshuverma8/hvcustomlinktree: A simple link aggregation tool built with React, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Inspired by Linktree, it helps organize and share links on a single, customizable page. Lightweight, responsive, and perfect for personal use.Input component can be used by anyone just by modifying the parameters.

items.content_html: Alternative to Netlify/Decap CMS. Fast, lightweight, Git-based headless CMS. Modern UX, first-class i18n support, open source & free. Made with Svelte.

items.content_html: A lightweight dependency injection container that allows you to register and resolve dependencies in your application. It supports both lazy and non-lazy dependencies, as well as resolving chain dependencies.
items.title: nothua/ts-dependency-injector: A lightweight dependency injection container that allows you to register and resolve dependencies in your application. It supports both lazy and non-lazy dependencies, as well as resolving chain dependencies.
